title: Review: Specialized Tactic 4 is a comfortable full coverage Trail Helmet with MIPS Evolve
content:
Specialized has revamped a long-standing member of their range of mountain bike helmets, the Specialized Tactic, with an all-new fit and improved safety features. Retailing at $110 USD, the Tactic is costs $10 more than its predecessor; that extra cash gets you a rotational impact protection upgrade to MIPS Evolve, improved integration with sunglasses and

The post Review: Specialized Tactic 4 is a comfortable full coverage Trail Helmet with MIPS Evolve appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
